Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Pulls target unit to the Viper. Enemy is stunned for 1 second.
Root.Name: Abduct

Root.Tooltip: Creates a cloud that slows movement speed and prevents enemy units and structures from attacking and using energy-based abilities. Lasts for 10 seconds.
Root.Name: Disabling Cloud

Root.Tooltip: Drains up to 75 life from a friendly Zerg unit and gives the Viper 2 energy for each point of life drained.
Root.Name: Consumption

Root.Tooltip:
Creates a parasitic cloud that deals 90 damage over 10 to the target and enemy air units nearby. If the target dies, the cloud remains in the air where the enemy died until it expires.

Cannot target ground units or structures.
Root.Name: Parasitic Bomb

Root.Tooltip: Abduct stuns units for an additional 5 seconds.
Root.Name: Paralytic Barbs

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 2.
Root.Name: Evolve to Leviathan

Root.Tooltip: Units gain 0% life, 0% attack speed, and 0% energy regeneration.
Root.Name: Biomass Gathered

Root.Tooltip: This unit can gain power by collecting Biomass from slain enemy units.
Root.Name: Biomass Gathered
